command: show bgp vpnv4 unicast vrf all
ttp_template:
<group name="local_pref_metric_network_next_hop">
BGP table version is 7, local router ID is 192.168.{{METRIC | ORPHRASE}}.1
Status codes: s suppressed, d damped, h history, {{STATUS | ORPHRASE}} valid, > best, i - internal
*>i10.2.2.0/24  192.168.0.2  0  {{LOCAL_PREF | ORPHRASE}}  0 i
*  {{NETWORK}}  {{NEXT_HOP}}  0  100  0 {{PATH | ORPHRASE}}
</group>
cli_content:
BGP table version is 7, local router ID is 192.168.0.1
Status codes: s suppressed, d damped, h history, * valid, > best, i - internal
Origin codes: i - IGP, e - EGP, ? - incomplete

   Network          Next Hop            Metric LocPrf Weight Path
*> 10.1.1.0/24      0.0.0.0                  0         32768 i
*>i10.2.2.0/24      192.168.0.2              0    100      0 i
   10.3.3.0/24      192.168.0.3              0    100      0 i
*>i10.4.4.0/24      192.168.0.4              0    100      0 i
   10.5.5.0/24      192.168.0.5              0    100      0 65000 65100 i
*  10.6.6.0/24      192.168.0.6              0    100      0 65100 65200 i
>
textfsm_template:
Value STATUS (\S+)
Value NETWORK (\S+)
Value NEXT_HOP (\S+)
Value METRIC (\d+)
Value LOCAL_PREF (\d+)
Value WEIGHT (\d+)
Value PATH ([\d\sa-zA-Z]+)

Start
  ^\s*Network\s+Next Hop\s+.*$$
  ^${STATUS}\s+${NETWORK}\s+${NEXT_HOP}\s+${METRIC}\s+${LOCAL_PREF}\s+${WEIGHT}\s+${PATH}\s*$$ -> Record
